io.lovelacetech.server.controller

Class DeviceController

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.lovelacetech.server.controller.BaseController
      • io.lovelacetech.server.controller.DeviceController

  • @RestController
 @CrossOrigin
 @RequestMapping(value="/api/secure/devices")
public class DeviceController
extends BaseController

    • Method Detail

      • getDevices

        @RequestMapping(value="/",
                method=GET)
public io.lovelacetech.server.model.api.response.device.DeviceListApiResponse getDevices(@RequestAttribute
                                                                                                                                                  io.lovelacetech.server.model.api.model.ApiUser authenticatedUser)
        GET /api/secure/devices/
        Gets all the devices in the database.

        RESPONSE: 
         {
   "status": 200,
   "message": "success",
   "response": {
     "devices": [Device]
   }
 }


        PERMISSIONS:
        The user must be a SUPER.

      • getDeviceByDeviceId

        @RequestMapping(value="/byDeviceId/{deviceId}",
                method=GET)
public io.lovelacetech.server.model.api.response.device.DeviceApiResponse getDeviceByDeviceId(@RequestAttribute
                                                                                                                                                                            io.lovelacetech.server.model.api.model.ApiUser authenticatedUser,
                                                                                                                                                                            @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                            java.util.UUID deviceId,
                                                                                                                                                                            @RequestParam(defaultValue="false")
                                                                                                                                                                            boolean filled)
        GET /api/secure/devices/byDeviceId/{deviceId}?filled={true|false}
        Gets a single Device by "deviceId".

        RESPONSE: 
         {
   "status": 200,
   "message": "success",
   "response": Device
 }


        PERMISSIONS: The user must have permissions for this Device. They must either:
        • Be a SUPER
        • Be an ADMIN of the company that this Device belongs to
        • Be a USER with permissions for the Location this Device belongs to.

      • getDevicesByLocationId

        @RequestMapping(value="/byLocationId/{locationId}",
                method=GET)
public io.lovelacetech.server.model.api.response.device.DeviceListApiResponse getDevicesByLocationId(@RequestAttribute
                                                                                                                                                                                       io.lovelacetech.server.model.api.model.ApiUser authenticatedUser,
                                                                                                                                                                                       @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                       java.util.UUID locationId,
                                                                                                                                                                                       @RequestParam(defaultValue="true")
                                                                                                                                                                                       boolean filled)
        GET /api/secure/devices/byLocationId/{locationId}?filled={true|false}
        Gets the Devices at the Location with "locationId".

        RESPONSE: 
         {
   "status": 200,
   "message": "success",
   "response": {
     "devices": [Device]
   }
 }


        PERMISSIONS:
        The user must have permissions for the Location with "locationId". The user must either:
        • Be a SUPER
        • Be an ADMIN of the company that the Location belongs to
        • Be a user with permissions for the Location with "locationId"

      • getDevicesForAuthenticated

        @RequestMapping(value="/forAuthenticated",
                method=GET)
public io.lovelacetech.server.model.api.response.device.DeviceListApiResponse getDevicesForAuthenticated(@RequestAttribute
                                                                                                                                                                                  io.lovelacetech.server.model.api.model.ApiUser authenticatedUser,
                                                                                                                                                                                  @RequestParam(defaultValue="false")
                                                                                                                                                                                  boolean filled)
        GET /api/secure/devices/forAuthenticated?filled={true|false}
        Gets all the devices belonging to the authenticated user. Specify the "filled" parameter to have the device populated with its children Assets.

        RESPONSE: 
         {
   "status": 200,
   "message": "success",
   "response": {
     "devices": [Device]
   }
 }


        PERMISSIONS: User must be authenticated.

      • putDeviceForAuthenticated

        @RequestMapping(value="/forAuthenticated",
                method=POST)
public io.lovelacetech.server.model.api.response.device.DeviceApiResponse putDeviceForAuthenticated(@RequestAttribute
                                                                                                                                                                              io.lovelacetech.server.model.api.model.ApiUser authenticatedUser,
                                                                                                                                                                              @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                              io.lovelacetech.server.model.api.model.ApiDevice device)
        POST /api/secure/devices/forAuthenticated
        Creates or updates a Device in the database.

        REQUEST BODY (CREATE): 
         {
   (required) "deviceCode": String,
   (required) "name": String,
   (optional) "locationId": UUID
 }
        This method should really only be used by Lovelace employees to register a manufactured device.

        REQUEST BODY (UPDATE): 
         {
   (required) "id": UUID,
   (optional) "name": String,
   (optional) "locationId": UUID
 }


        RESPONSE: 
         {
   "status": 200,
   "message": "success",
   "response": Device
 }

        PERMISSIONS: To create, user must be SUPER. To update, user must have permissions on the Location for this Device.

      • activateDeviceWithCode

        @RequestMapping(value="/activateDevice",
                method=POST)
public io.lovelacetech.server.model.api.response.device.DeviceApiResponse activateDeviceWithCode(@RequestAttribute
                                                                                                                                                                         io.lovelacetech.server.model.api.model.ApiUser authenticatedUser,
                                                                                                                                                                         @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                         io.lovelacetech.server.model.api.model.ApiDeviceActivation deviceActivation)
        POST /api/secure/devices/activateDevice
        Activates a new Device by device code, adding it to the location identified by "locationId".

        REQUEST BODY: 
         {
   (required) "deviceCode": String,
   (required) "locationId": UUID
 }


        RESPONSE: 
         {
   "status": 200,
   "message": "success",
   "response": Device
 }

        PERMISSIONS:
        The user must be an ADMIN for the Company where they're trying to activate this new Device.

      • deleteDeviceById

        @RequestMapping(value="/{deviceId}",
                method=DELETE)
public io.lovelacetech.server.model.api.response.device.DeviceApiResponse deleteDeviceById(@RequestAttribute
                                                                                                                                                                 io.lovelacetech.server.model.api.model.ApiUser authenticatedUser,
                                                                                                                                                                 @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                 java.util.UUID deviceId)
        DELETE /api/secure/devices/{deviceId}
        Deletes a Device by id. In actuality, the device is not removed from the database. Instead, its locationId is set to null, effectively "deactivating" it from the user's point of view.

        REQUEST BODY: 
         {
   "status": 200,
   "message": "success",
   "response": Device
 }

        PERMISSIONS:
        The user must be an ADMIN for the company where they're trying to delete this device.
